name: Bepuzzled Jigsaw Puzzle: Animals 103 Puzzles
detailed_description:
103 Puzzles– what great value!
This game showcases a wide variety of animals and is great for animal lovers!

Features:
3 different difficulties with countdown and hints
36 8x8 = 64 pieces
36 16x16 =256 pieces
31 32x32 = 1024 pieces

User friendly User Interface
'Magnetic' puzzle pieces to make life easier
Calming music

What more do you need and at such great value!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux or SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
